abilities.name: Lesser Avatar
abilities.description: Applies a basic dispel. Grants magic resistance and immunity to pure and reflected damage. For the duration, any negative effect from enemy spells has no effect.
notes: Interrupts the wielder's channeling abilities upon cast
Stacks multiplicatively with other magic resistance sources
Applies a basic dispel on the wielder
Grants debuff immunity and pure damage immunity for the entire duration
30% model size increase. Does not affect collision size
Avatar increases the total magic resistance by 0.5% per 10 intelligence points

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
When crafted with the Dormant Curio, the duration is increased by 30%
